preview.html: Heavy rain in a dream, if no harm comes from it, then it means goodness, food, and mercy. Heavy rain may indicate a person’s life and livelihood or the fulfillment of what the dreamer promised and achieved. If the heavy rain is in a well-known place, then it indicates the joy of its people, or the dreamer’s bliss and happiness. If the heavy rain is harmful, such as the sky raining blood or stones, then it indicates sins and transgressions. If the fortuneteller is traveling and sees heavy rain in his dream, then his travels will be blessed. Heavy, beneficial rain may indicate reconciliation between spouses or comfort for the person. Heavy rain symbolizes blessings, as is rain in the vision. Whoever sees heavy rain falling forcefully, dead matter will come to life for him and he will receive goodness, grace and blessings, and if he is distressed or in debt, God will alleviate his distress. Heavy rain in a dream is relief and relief in that year. Whoever sees heavy rain in a private place without people will receive benefit, kindness, and honor. Whoever sees rain falling from everywhere and uprooting trees, this is a trial, a disaster, or an epidemic. If the sky rains blood, this is misery. If the farmer sees heavy rain, this is good news and good news. It was said: If the rain is without dirt, then it is fertile. If the rain is honey, it is good for everyone, and the same applies if it is butter, milk, oil, and the like. Heavy rain in a dream indicates God’s mercy, religion, help, and help. Perhaps it indicates epidemics that come down from the sky, such as locusts, hail, and wind, especially if there is fire and the water is hot. Heavy rain can indicate strife and bloodshed, and it can indicate defects and diseases if not at the right time. And if the rain is heavy In season, this is comfort in travel or work, or for healing the sick, or pleasing the poor, or freeing a prisoner. If the dreamer washes off his impurity in heavy rain, or purifies himself with it for prayer, or washes off the dirt on his body or clothes with it, then if he is an unbeliever, he becomes Muslim, and if he sins, he repents, even if he is poor, God Almighty will enrich him, and if he is in need of the Lord, He will judge him. Whoever sees that the sky has rained swords, then people will be affected by strife and strife. Whoever dreams that he drinks from heavy rain water, then if he is pure, he will be cured, and if he drinks as long as he drinks rain water, he will get sick. Heavy rain in a dream for a single woman. Heavy rain in a single woman’s dream indicates a year in which she will be saved or a year in which she will be granted a wish or honor. . Whoever sees an unmarried woman praying in the pouring rain, God will hear her and respond to her. If an unmarried woman sees that she is praying in the rain, then she will be saved from distress. The wet dress was honored in the presence of Karim Aziz. If an unmarried woman sees heavy rain, she fears for herself. If an unmarried woman sees in a dream, as if the heavy rain washed away cars, houses, and animals, then calamity, hardship, or drought will occur. This place. If an unmarried woman sees that she is married and the rain falls heavy and heavy, then she will get married that year. If an unmarried woman sees that she is bathing in rainwater, then she will be stripped of all sins and mistakes

title: Learn about the interpretation of oud oil in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi and the interpretation of a dream about applying oud oil with oil and musk.

preview.html: Oud oil in a dream. Does seeing firewood portend good or ill? What are the negative symbols in a dream about oud oil? What does spoiled agarwood oil indicate in a dream? In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretation of seeing oud oil for single women, married women, pregnant women, and men, according to Ibn Sirin, Al-Usaimi, and the leading scholars of interpretation. Dreaming that the dreamer will soon earn a lot of money and invest it in his work, then this corruption symbolizes deception and betrayal of the covenant. Aloes oil in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets seeing aloes oil as a sign of the good qualities that the dreamer has, and if the dreamer sees someone giving him oud in In his dream, this indicates his high status and good behavior among people, but if the dreamer places a lot of sticks on his body, this indicates not performing prayers and ceremonies. If the dreamer places the evil eye on his body, this is a sign that he is lying to people and speaking badly about them in their absence. And he wants that in life. Oud oil in Al-Osaimi’s dream. Al-Osaimi interprets wood oil in a dream as evidence that the dreamer is a righteous person who approaches the Lord (Glory be to Him) by helping the poor and needy. If the dreamer gives the oud to a stranger, this symbolizes that he stands beside people in their times. difficult and does not abandon those who ask for his help. To get the most accurate interpretation of your dream, search on Google, the dream interpretation website on the Internet, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Oud oil in a single woman’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about wood oil for unmarried women indicates kindness, good morals, and adherence to customs And the traditions of their society. If a student of knowledge puts oud in her clothes in her dream, this is a sign that she will succeed in her studies and achieve many achievements in the coming tomorrow. Oud oil in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about wood oil for a married woman symbolizes the good condition of her children and hearing some good news about them soon. . She is gentle and kind to people. Buying a bottle of firewood in a dream is a sign that a married woman will enjoy material prosperity, the luxury of life, and the end of the poverty and tight situation she is experiencing. A lot of experience and a lot of skills in the near future. Oud oil in a pregnant woman’s dream. Scientists interpreted wood oil in a pregnant woman’s dream as a sign that she will soon improve her health condition and get rid of the pregnancy problems she was suffering from. If the dreamer sees her partner drawing oud for himself, this indicates On the love and mutual respect between them and the good relationship that unites them. Seeing perfume with wood oil in a dream for a pregnant woman. If the dreamer was perfumed with agarwood oil in her dream and did not like its smell, then this is a sign that she was deceived and deceived by a person from whom she did not expect harm, so she should be careful. . They do not trust anyone easily and level-headedly

title: Interpretation of seeing a lover calling

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of calling the beloved. Many of us see our beloved in a dream and wake up from his sleep wishing that this dream will come true. There are others who, when they see the beloved in their dreams, become afraid because they fear that the beloved will be a symbol of fear for them, but seeing the beloved carries many interpretations and interpretations, and the interpretation of the dream of calling the beloved In a dream, it is one of the dreams that many people search for in its interpretation, as well as among the dreams that vary and have multiple interpretations according to the dreamer. A loved one in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a lover calling: Seeing a lover or lover in a dream indicates self-respect and shows the person’s acceptance and self-respect. And when it is... This lover who came in a dream is the same person you secretly loved, or the person you want to connect with. In this case, this dream is interpreted as a state of dissatisfaction, a feeling of inferiority and emotional inadequacy. In case you see your ex-lover in a dream, This dream is an indication of some things that are still stuck in your mind about a certain relationship, even if the dreamer has an emotional relationship at the moment, this indicates that he does not. He forgot about his old relationship. The lover in a dream: Seeing a lover in a dream does not indicate a specific person, his relationship, or his personality with the dreamer, but seeing him in general is a good sign indicating the appearance of tidings for the dreamer, especially for someone who is not accustomed to seeing a loved one in his dreams. The dream A beloved in a dream indicates a person who has a high status and rank, because the beloved is one of the characteristics of the Messenger of God, may God bless him and grant him peace. Whoever sees his beloved in his dream in good condition, wearing a good dress, and his words are good, this indicates good news and he will overcome the fortune-teller. The opposite of seeing a loved one is anger or anger, as this is a sign of difficulties and hardships that will befall the fortuneteller on the part of family or friends. A lover in a dream refers to an honest person who has a good heart. Psychological meanings of seeing a lover in a dream: The appearance of a lover in a dream can be a result of a relationship The duration of acquaintance and it can indicate that the future vision of the relationship is unclear, so this topic is formed by the subconscious mind of the viewer as a kind of constant reminder to him of the completion of this relationship. If the lover appears in a dream and the dreamer speaks to him to ask for something, this is a sign that this lover is traitorous and treacherous, And his betrayal will be revealed. Whoever sees his beloved in a dream and actually breaks up with that lover, this is a sign of how much the dreamer longs to see his beloved and the extent of his attachment to him, and it indicates the longing and longing that was between them. These dreams often come to express a bleeding wound in the heart that has not yet healed. Whoever sees his deceased lover in his dream, this dream is a sign of longing for him, and this dream is an interpretation of what is in the subconscious mind. When a man sees his girlfriend in a dream and she appears with a bright appearance and a beautiful personality, this is the interpretation. That the dreamer will judge a woman who enjoys happiness, beauty and pleasure and has a large share of the inheritance. Seeing the beloved in a dream who is sick and appears anxious, this indicates that a relationship in the future

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream?

preview.html: According to the interpretations of the great dream interpreters, such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi and others, in the various cases in which this dream was mentioned and the social status of the pioneer, whether he was general, married, or pregnant. Widowed or divorced. What is the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman in a complete dream? The implications of a dream about a pregnant woman were as followsDreams related to pregnancy are usually an encouraging sign that something good will happen in the dreamer’s life. This vision also indicates future successes on a personal and professional level This dream may indicate the positive energy inherent in the dreamer and his abilities for self-development and creativity. In the case of a dream in which another person is pregnant, this indicates that new things will happen in the dreamer’s life and happy future events. This vision also suggests a major change in the dreamer’s life. , or the completion of a creative project, or a positive change in situation, or a spiritual awakening. What is the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman in a complete dream by Ibn Sirin? What is the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman in a complete dream according to Ibn Sirin’s interpretation in a complete dream as follows: A man’s dream of a woman indicates A pregnant woman indicates that he will obtain many good things and nourishment, like the womb of the woman he saw in the dream. Seeing the world in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates increased knowledge and awareness. This dream in a married woman’s dream indicates that she will suffer from marital problems and instability in her family affairs. It could This dream also indicates the dreamer’s desire to achieve a goal in this world and his efforts to achieve it. What is the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman in a dream by Ibn Shaheen? What is the interpretation of a dream of a pregnant woman in a dream according to Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation as follows: If she sees the mother in her dream That her unmarried daughter is pregnant, this indicates that the girl has committed an inappropriate or immoral act. A man’s dream of a pregnant woman may indicate the sadness that the dreamer will feel as a result of an unfortunate event, but he will soon overcome it. This vision also indicates an increase in the woman’s livelihood and money This dream also shows the benefit that the dreamer derives from the woman who saw Kamel in a dream. What is the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman in a dream according to Al-Kamil according to Al-Nabulsi? What is the interpretation of a dream about a pregnant woman in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation as follows: [3] If one sees a pregnant woman Full in a dream, this indicates tension and anxiety. Perhaps the dream shows the dreamer’s closeness to the enemy or love and temptation. If the pregnant woman in the dream is barren, this indicates sterile traditions, cruelty, many temptations and thieves. The rope of an old man in a dream is a sign of fertility after Attraction, and it can also indicate unemployment. To see a pregnant woman in a dream. The interpretation of a pregnant woman’s dream was as follows. If a woman sees a pregnant woman in her dream, this means that she will get married soon, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of dreams and visions prayer rug in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a prayer rug in a dream has many meanings and connotations. Jurists and sheikhs unanimously agree that seeing it in a dream is a sign of goodness, blessing, and justice, and in the following lines we present it to you. Interpretation of dreams and visions of a prayer rug in a dream for an unmarried man, a married man, and a pregnant woman. Read also: The toilet in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a prayer rug in a dream. A dream: Interpretation of dreams and visions: A prayer rug in a dream. Many people know that seeing a prayer rug in a dream is a sign of kindness, but they are unaware of its interpretation. That is why we present to you the interpretation of dreams and visions of a prayer rug in a dream through the following paragraphs. Seeing a prayer rug in a dream according to Ibn Shirin indicates justice and prosperity in this world and the hereafter, and a good spirit, and it also indicates guidance and piety. Some scholars interpreted seeing a prayer rug in a dream as It is a sign of achieving goals and achieving what the individual aspires to. As for Al-Nabulsi, he interpreted it as news of the approaching status and high position in work and reputation. It also symbolizes marriage to a pure and pious woman for unmarried people. Basically, seeing a prayer rug in a dream indicates goodness and blessing, and its connotations are close. From performing Hajj and Umrah, as Ibn Shaheen says. Seeing a prayer rug in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to preserve the prayer and perform it on time. Seeing a silk prayer rug indicates the believer’s sincerity in worship and performing duties. Read also: Pregnancy in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a prayer rug in a dream for a single woman. Seeing a green prayer rug in a person’s dream symbolizes the nearness of hearing happy news and the occurrence of pleasant events that will bring joy and happiness to the dreamer’s heart. Also Its vision indicates the imminent realization of desires, the achievement of the goals that the visionary seeks and her success in the matters and plans that she will begin to implement. Seeing the purchase of a prayer rug in a dream is good news for a close relationship and marriage to a good, righteous person who is able to take responsibility. Penguin in a dream Interpretation of seeing a rug Praying in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a prayer rug in a married woman’s dream indicates the calm and stability of her married life and her love for her husband and has connotations of many good things that will happen to her and her family soon. On the other hand, seeing buying a prayer blanket in a married woman’s dream indicates that there will be There is almost nothing to provide for a child, characterized by piety, piety, and fear of God. Whoever sees a green prayer rug in her dream, this is an indication of the abundance of food and the large amount of money that will come to her soon. Whoever sees that her husband gives her a prayer rug in a dream, this is again a good omen of her pregnancy. The connotations of the prayer rug mainly indicate the many graces and blessings that await a married woman in the near future. Read also: Washing the dead. Interpretation of seeing a prayer rug in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a prayer rug in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the fetus is in good condition and in good health, as it indicates Until the birth will be easy. Seeing a green carpet in a mother’s dream

preview.html: Bats in a dream. There are many dreams that we may see in our dreams that leave several questions in our minds, as these dreams usually indicate events that are about to happen and may also be the result of our thoughts, but most dreams we see have many interpretations, so we will explain to you through our article the interpretation of seeing a bat. In a dream. The general interpretation of seeing bats in a dream. Seeing a bully in a dream has many indicators for the dreamer. It may mean that you are angry with those around you. Or it may be a great anger in your heart that will explode very soon. It may mean that you have many feelings and emotions that you want to express. But the description and expression betray what you feel and what you are experiencing. If the dreamer smells dull applause, this is a sign of... The fear that lives in his heart, which makes him give up many things in his best interest, thus developing himself and his life. In general, a skunk in a dream may indicate the need to control your anger and emotions, and it is necessary to unload it from your favorite sport or hobbies so that the future of your life is not affected. The meaning of seeing a bat in a dream: The meaning of seeing an old head in a dream is the struggle of insight into the bitter reality and the ideas he created in a group of people around him, only to discover the extent of their hatred and betrayal of him and his beautiful dreams. He created in his imagination the rosy life he wanted to live, only to be surprised by the bitter reality and harsh conditions he was going through. Therefore, he must accept all these unexpected things and continue to live, returning to his normal, good qualities for many people, although they do not deserve them, but they will help you improve and develop yourself, to realize all this. The visionary has come to deal with events and problems, although he is not convinced of everything that happened. title: Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a strange man for a married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a strange man for a married woman: This dream is one of the dreams that many women see frequently, and it causes them anxiety and distress when they wake up from their sleep and raises enough questions for them to know the interpretation of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a strange man for a married woman: If the wife dreams that there is a stranger He sleeps with her in a dream, this indicates the deterioration of her emotional relationship between her and her husband, and this vision is a warning message that she should get close to her husband. Some interpreters believe that a married woman having sex with a stranger in a dream is evidence of her desire to benefit from this person, and if she sees... A married woman says she is having sex with a man she does not know, but he is a savage. And aggressive, and this indicates that she lives a harsh life with her husband, which created psychological and physical problems for her. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a strange man for a married woman in Ibn Sirin. If a married woman sees that an unknown man lives with her in a dream, this is evidence that she will gain many good things. She achieves her goals and aspirations, which she has been striving for for a long time. Work. If a married woman sees that she is in a relationship with a man she does not know and he is rich, this indicates that she will obtain money and many good things. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a strange man for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that a stranger is sleeping with her in a dream, this is a sign that she She is worried and stressed about her pregnancy and childbirth or the many problems between her and her husband and the dream of a pregnant woman. Contacting a man she does not know indicates that she will enjoy many good things and her pregnancy will go well. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is sleeping with a strange man who is white, this is evidence that she will give birth to a son who is dry and difficult to deal with. However, if a pregnant woman dreams that she is in a relationship with it. A black stranger, this indicates that she will give birth to a disobedient girl who does not follow the teachings of her religion. Seeing a pregnant woman having intercourse against her will in a dream indicates the difficulty of her pregnancy. Interpretation of a dream about intercourse with a known person for a married woman: Seeing the same wife getting married with someone she knows in a dream is evidence that she is a woman. A disobedient woman commits many sins, and this vision portends her repentance for these actions. The interpretation of a married woman who sees herself having sex with someone she knows other than her husband in a dream indicates that she is a woman with tender feelings who are affected by everything that happens around her, such as being affected by the words of people in her life. A happy and stable married life, and soon you will hear happy news. If a wife dreams that she is sleeping with a man she knows but he is mistreating her, this means that there are many complex problems in her life that are difficult to solve. Interpretation of a dream that a pregnant woman is having sex with someone other than her husband. Seeing a pregnant woman From behind, she sleeps with a man other than her husband, which symbolizes that she is committing sins and desires repentance and forgiveness from God. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is sleeping with a group of people she does not know at the same time, this means that many jealous people are waiting for her.

title: What is the complete interpretation of seeing salt in a dream?

preview.html: Hadot offers you a complete interpretation of salt in a dream. Salt is known as one of the most essential things around the world. This is the main thing in food. Also, seeing salt in a dream is one of the visions that many people see in a complete dream, and for this reason we have collected for you, dear ones in God, everything related to the interpretation and interpretation of seeing a bag of salt. Dreaming of washing with water and salt, where we put the interpretation of sprinkling salt on a person in a dream, as well as the interpretation in a dream of seeing salt for single and pregnant women, as well as for men. From the interpretation books of major scholars on dreams and visions. If you are interested in the interpretation, you should follow the article. What is the dream of Imam al-Sadiq’s salt? The interpretation of seeing someone giving salt in a dream is a sign of money that the dreamer will receive from the person himself. The dreamer’s vision of rotten salt in a complete dream is One of the unpleasant visions that indicate illness, sadness and envy. Salt in a dream shows a lot of money that the dreamer will earn without fatigue and hardship and is a sign of inheritance. Seeing salt in a dream filled with a sick person is good news and evidence that he will soon recover from illness and enjoy good health. Good.See also: Why dream of seeing vinegar in a dream in fullWhy dream of salt in a dream for a common womanThe interpretation of seeing salt in a dream in full for a common woman is a good dream in most cases and is a sign of goodness and benefit.In addition, seeing salt in a dream and cooking food with it Evidence of the imminent marriage of a bowl woman to a man who will support her. Seeing rotten salt in a dream is a sign that unpleasant things will happen in the life of a bowl woman and a sign of the end of their relationship. See also: Why dream of food in a dreamWhy dream of a bag of saltMany interpreters objected to seeing a bag Salt in a dream, and some argued that this is evidence of the dreamer’s illness. Other interpreters of dreams and visions also reported that a bag of salt is evidence of the end of disputes between the dreamer and some people. See also: Why dream of sugar in a dream? Why do we sprinkle salt on a person in a dream? Sprinkling salt in The dream generally indicates the expulsion of evil and indicates the departure of problems, evil, and people who harbor hatred against the dreamer. Why dream that you are washing with water and salt? A dream in a dream that is full of itself, and that it is washed with water and salt, is good news and evidence of the removal of worries and problems. But in a dream that is full of a married or ordinary woman This is one of the visions that indicate problems in her life, and God knows best. Bathing with water and salt in a dream is complete for the patient, evidence of recovery from the disease and improvement of the dreamer’s health. See also: Why does pepper dream in a complete dream? If you have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will By responding to you.

title: Interpretation of seeing someone you hate in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a person you hate in a dream. Seeing a person in a human’s dream carries with it many meanings and connotations that may sometimes symbolize goodness or may indicate the opposite. Jurists depend in their interpretation on the condition of the dreamer and the details of the dream, and we will explain all of that. Points related to this vision in the following article. Seeing someone you hate in a dreamSeeing someone you hate in a dream refers to many signs and symbols, which are: The interpretation of dreaming about someone you hate in a dream and you were not loved in reality indicates that this person is hostile and harbors evil for the fortuneteller. Seeing a human being in The dream is about someone he hates, but he is unknown, and this vision expresses the mistreatment of others and the corruption of his morals in reality. What does it mean if I dream of someone I hate? This may indicate that he is surrounded by a group of hypocrites who pretend to love him but are waiting for the appropriate opportunity to attack him and eliminate him. If a person sees in a vision someone who hates him, this is clear evidence that he is going through a difficult period full of difficulties and obstacles that prevent him from his comfort and happiness, as the dream indicates He will suffer from diseases. The coming period. Seeing a person you hate in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin explained more than one indication that you see a person you hate in a dream, which is represented in: If the dreamer sees in a dream a person he hates and knows in reality, then this dream is not good and indicates that he will lose his wealth and stumble. Financially in the coming period. If one sees in a dream someone he hates but does not know, there is an indication that he will rise to the highest positions and heights and will soon live a prosperous life full of happy moments. Seeing someone you hate in a dream means being single. Seeing someone you hate in one dream has many interpretations. Namely: If the fortuneteller is single and sees in her dream a person she does not like and who is well known to her, then this is a clear indication that the big party will be a resounding disaster that will be difficult to get out of. Whereas a girl who has never been married saw in her dream someone who hates her and gives her something, then this dream is not good and indicates However, it will be exposed to many crises of various kinds and the misfortunes that will cause it. Because of the deterioration of her psychological state and her unhappiness. Seeing someone she hates in a married woman’s dream. Seeing someone she hates in a married woman’s dream has many meanings and symbols, the most important of which are: If the dreamer gets married and sees someone she hates in a dream, this is a sign of her inability to make sound and rational decisions due to her haste, which leads to Instability and unhappiness in her life. If the wife sees in her dream someone who hates giving her a gift, then this vision is not good and symbolizes that he wants to harm her in any way in reality. Interpretation of a dream about talking for a long time with someone she hates in a woman’s dream means that she is living a difficult life and is suffering Of living and financial problems in the coming period. Seeing a person she hates in a wife’s dream symbolizes that one of her children will suffer from diseases. Seeing a person she hates in a pregnant woman’s dream Seeing a person she hates in a pregnant woman’s dream has many meanings and meanings, which are: If the dreamer is pregnant and sees in If she dreams of someone she hates, this is an indication of a period

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a severed hand in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of the dream of seeing a severed hand in a dream according to Ibn Sirin, and cutting off an arm and a leg is corruption. The dream of seeing a severed arm in a dream differs from one person to another, and seeing a severed hand in a dream. The dream indicates distress, anxiety, and financial distress, and there is a lot of money, as the vision of the hand shows. Dream of seeing a hand cut off in a dream, follow us. Seeing a hand cut off by Ibn Sirin. Cutting off an arm in a dream has many signs and meanings that differ from one person to another. Ibn Sirin explained that he saw a cut off hand in a dream in agony. Seeing a man’s hand cut off in a dream also indicates that he He cuts off his offspring, which means that he cannot have children. Seeing the dreamer cutting off his hand in a dream is a sign of goodness that will happen soon. Seeing a traveler whose hand was cut off by his mother in a dream means that he has returned from travel. Cutting off the hand from the palm indicates that the dreamer He left prayer, took an oath, or stole. Seeing a severed hand in a dream indicates separation between loved ones and close people, or separation between spouses or the fiancé. As for seeing a hand severed from behind, it indicates corruption, disobedience, and sin. As for whoever sees in a dream that he has his hand cut off, The left hand indicates the death of his brother or sister. Seeing the left hand cut off indicates separation between brothers and relatives. Seeing a man as if his wife is cutting off his hands is a sign of separation. Seeing the cutting off of the white hand. Seeing the cutting off of the left hand in a dream. It is better to see the cutting off of the hand in a dream. Seeing a white hand in a dream is a good and abundant livelihood that he will receive soon, and evidence that he has done many good deeds in his life. Seeing a long arm in a dream also indicates a person’s long life. Interpretation of a dream about holding a hand: Seeing a short arm in a dream indicates the shortness of the dreamer’s life. As for Seeing a married woman holding the hand of a stranger, this indicates that she is doing something forbidden. Seeing an unmarried girl holding the hand of her mother or father in a dream shows the strength of the family bond. Seeing a black hand in a dream indicates problems and difficulties. Seeing a man holding his wife’s hand in a dream It is a sign of marital happiness and understanding between them. Seeing a pregnant woman’s hand cut off. It is said that this concept reflects the occurrence of many problems and facing many problems during pregnancy, and the concept indicates that the pregnant woman will also suffer from problems during childbirth. God forbid, seeing her with a cut off hand means That you heard unpleasant news or it may mean that you are feeling pain at the moment, so you should listen to the doctor’s advice. As for dreaming of cutting hands with a knife, this is a good vision, because it expresses the elimination of relief and many problems, as well as the psychological state of passers-by. The insight sees a lot of Blood, some hands are considered good for the student, because this can be a symbol of a lot of money, but also many signs of good maintenance and halal, so much so that they saw blood as expressed by their return from absence, Glory be to Him, the Almighty knows best. Seeing a woman’s hand cut off, said Ibn Shaheen (Ibn Shaheen The dream of a married woman expresses problems
